channel.title: Physics on Fraser Bullock
channel.description: Recent content in Physics on Fraser Bullock

item.title: Visualising Gravity
item.description: Check out what I’m talking about. Recently I’ve been playing around with the Web Audio API more specifically using it for visualisers. One of the main reasons this API exists is to make visualisers for audio, but for some reason, you don’t see this very much on the internet. Why is something that is beyond me, but in the mean time, I’m having fun with it. Another API that’s been around is matter js, a physics engine written in js for browsers.
